args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv {a b c L : ‚Ñù} (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (ùìù[(Ioo a b \ {c})] c) (ùìù L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv {a b c L : ‚Ñù} (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (ùìù[Ioo a b \ {c}] c) (ùìù L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f ((Ioo a b) \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (ùìù[((Ioo a b) \ {c})] c) (ùìù L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f ((Ioo a b) \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c ((Ioo a b) \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f { x | a < x ‚àß x < b })
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f ({ x | a < x ‚àß x < b } \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c ({ x | a < x ‚àß x < b } \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Filter

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f { x | a < x ‚àß x < b })
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hL : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Filter

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on the open interval (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c}
for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_tendsto_deriv (a b c L : ‚Ñù) (ha : a < c) (hb : c < b)
  (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ContinuousOn f { x | a < x ‚àß x < b })
  (hd : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f ({ x | a < x ‚àß x < b } \ {c}))
  (hL : Filter.Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c ({ x | a < x ‚àß x < b } \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  HasDerivAt f L c := by sorry
